measure.CatchLine: Expands eligibility for cities and Metro to amend their urban growth boundaries under a temporary program.
measure.MeasureSummary: Digest: This Act amends temp UGB program and lets LCDC award grants. (Flesch Readability Score: 80.3). Expands eligibility for cities and Metro to amend their urban growth boundaries under a temporary program. Authorizes the Land Conservation and Development Commission to issue grants to implement the commission's duties. Declares an emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to land use; amending ORS 197.045 and sections 49, 50, 51, 52, 53, 55, 56 and 60, chapter 110, Oregon Laws 2024, and section 2, chapter 341, Oregon Laws 2025; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to land use; declaring an emergency.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of House Interim Committee on Housing and Homelessness for Representative Pam Marsh)
measure.CurrentLocation: In Senate Committee Awaiting transfer to Desk

sponsors.PresessionFiledMessage: Introduced and printed pursuant to House Rule 12.00.  Presession filed.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Recommendation: Do pass with amendments and be printed A-Engrossed.
Third reading. Carried by Marsh. Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 40; Nays, 1--Walters; Excused, 12--Boice, Bunch, Diehl, Edwards, Hartman, Levy B, Lewis, Osborne, Reschke, Smith G, Valderrama, Wright; Excused for Business of the House, 7--Boshart Davis, Harbick, McIntire, Owens, Scharf, Skarlatos, Wallan.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to President's desk.
Public Hearing and Work Session held.
